original_text: Jesus left the temple and was walking away when his disciples came up to him to call his attention to its buildings.
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에서 나와서 가실 때에 제자들이 성전 건물들을 가리켜 보이려고 나아오니

sentences.original_text: when his disciples came up to him
to call his attention to its buildings
sentences.korean_translation: 그 건물들에 그의 관심을 끌기 위해
